title: Heartwood Naming Conventions
description: Rules for linguistic consistency and cognitive clarity across the firm's filesystem.

values.name: Eukaryotic Singulars
values.rule: Collective directories like 'inbox', 'trash', and 'memory' remain singular.
values.rationale: Reflects their status as single-subject organisms within the eukaryotic tree.

values.name: One Word Constraint
values.rule: Linguistic levers (glossary terms) should aim for a single-word essence.
values.rationale: Brevity increases the potency of the lever and ensures high-resolution cognitive anchoring.

values.name: Polysemy Awareness
values.rule: Avoid ambiguous or context-dependent terms without qualified definitions.
values.rationale: Absolute precision in naming prevents 'Data Drift' and maintains the integrity of the forensic record.
